name: Karma Grip for HERO6 Black/HERO5 Black

features: Capture stabilized footage so smooth your ordinary shots will look extraordinary. Enjoy professional, cinema-quality video whether you’re hiking, biking or chasing your kids through the park. Compatible with most GoPro mounts, Karma Grip captures the amazing handheld, gear-mounted and body-worn perspectives only a GoPro can—now with pro-quality stabilization. Simple built-in camera controls let you power on and off, change modes, start and stop recording, and add HiLight Tags on the fly.1 Capture incredible … Karma Grip.
Use with the optional Karma Grip Extension Cable2
Offload footage without un-mounting your camera1
Extra-long 1 hour and 45 minute battery life
Charge your GoPro and Karma Grip at the same time1
Recharge up to 70% faster3 using the optional GoPro Supercharger (International Dual-Port Charger)
1 HERO5 Black, HERO5 Session, HERO4 Black and HERO4 Silver only. Camera control, camera charging and content offload are not supported for HERO Session.
3 Compared to conventional 5V 1.5A chargers. Charging performance may vary based on charging conditions.
Note: HERO5 Session, HERO4 Black, HERO4 Silver, and HERO Session require a camera-specific Karma Harness, sold separately.
